text: BavataH priqyamEqvaina(gm)# samAqnAnA$M karOti dviqpadA# purO&nuvAqkyA# Bavati dviqpada# EqvAva# rundhEq catu#ShpadA yAqjyA# catu#Shpada Eqva paqSUnava# rundhE dEvAsuqrAH saM~Mya#ttA Asaqn tE dEqvA miqthO vipri#yA Asaqn tE$ (1q) &nyO$&nyasmaiq jyaiShThyAqyA-ti#ShThamAnAScatuqrddhA vya#krAmannaqgnirvasu#BiqH sOmO# ruqdrairindrO# maqrudBiqrvaru#Na AdiqtyaiH sa indra#H praqjApa#tiqmupA#dhAvaqt ta - [  ]  62
